gridTitle: Fortnite Ballistic v36.10: K-Zone Commons Update
description: Fortnite Ballistic v36.10 brings the K-Zone Commons shell map, Machine Pistol, Mid Mist Grenade, and pre-game warmup.

gridTitle: Fortnite Blitz Royale: Full Throttle. Phone Ready.
description: Fortnite Blitz Royale: roguelike meets battle royale with four weeks of major updates!

gridTitle: Bruno Mars is Home in Fortnite Festival Season 9!
description: The door is left open for the next Fortnite Festival Icon… Bruno Mars! Bruno makes a grand entrance with new Outfits, Jam Tracks, and more.

gridTitle: Squad Up and Save the Day in LEGO® Fortnite Expeditions!
description: Time to demolish evil. In LEGO Fortnite Expeditions, choose your path of superhero study and team up in 4-player cooperative Missions!
